module.name: document_structure
module.keywords: module, document structure, file relationship, document relationship
module.purpose: The document structure application module supports the requirement to represent a document structure by defining relationships between files, document definitions and versions of documents.

inscope.li: relationships between files to represent a document structure;
relationships between document definitions to represent a document structure;
relationships between versions of documents to represent a document structure.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts of representing a document structure.

uof.name: Document_Structure
uof.description: The Document_Structure UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of defining relationships between files, document representations and structure relationships between versions of managed documents.
